DOC.brief_summary: Abatacept disrupts T-cell coactivation signals in rheumatoid arthritis (RA). Its potential effects on B cells are not well described. This study will assess the effects of abatacept therapy on the phenotype and function of peripheral blood B cells in patients with RA.
DOC.brief_title: Does Abatacept Induce Regulatory B Cells in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: RA as defined by ACR/EULAR criteria Clinical indication to start abatacept therapy Treatment by rituximab in the previous year
